name: Introduction to Art History
description: This course provides an overview of the history of art from ancient times to the present.

name: History of European Art I
description: This course covers the history of European art from ancient times to the Renaissance.

name: History of European Art II
description: This course covers the history of European art from the Renaissance to the present.

name: History of Non-Western Art I
description: This course covers the history of Non-Western art from ancient times to the modern period.

name: History of Non-Western Art II
description: This course covers the history of Non-Western art from the modern period to the present.

name: Museum Studies
description: This course covers the history, theory, and practice of museums.
